DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator to identify use of antibiotic medications for any patient medical condition.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the administration of antibiotics to the patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (an-tih-by-AH-tik) A drug used to treat infections caused by bacteria and other microorganisms.

Concepts.definition: Substances naturally produced by microorganisms or their derivatives that selectively target microorganisms not humans. Antibiotics kill or inhibit the growth of microorganisms by targeting components of the microbial cell absent from human cells, including bacterial cell walls, cell membrane, and 30S or 50S ribosomal subunits. These substances are used in the treatment of bacterial and other microbial infections.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COMMENT_357
ReferenceDocuments.description: Specify the antibiotic agent according to protocol using the "Agent Name" CDE

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient currently receiving antibiotics?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive antibiotics during this cycle?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were the antibiotics prophylactic (e.g., for prevention of a urinary tract infection or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease)

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving antibiotic therapy for an active infection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was it limited to prophylactic antibiotics (e.g., for prevention of a urinary tract infection or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior antibiotic(s) treatment for active infection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were prophylactic antibiotics (e.g. levofloxacin) given while patient was neutropenic during this reporting period?Â

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient currently receiving an azole antifungal or a macrolide antibiotic?
